content.rendered:
FALL FASHION TRENDS PREVIEW

Who’s ready for Fall? As the weather starts to cool down and the new Fall September Fashion magazines start to come out thick as a dictionary I can already start to smell the pumpkin spiced latte. Funny thing is that September 1st feels like Fall is in the air already, but Summer actually does not officially end until September 23rd…so we can mix and match our cute outfits from Summer and Fall together in September.

All looks are from my favorite FWRD.COM. Gold hair clips are from Zara.com. Zara has been killing it lately with affordable accessories that have a luxury look and feel to them. 

Top handbag is Saint Laurent. Leopard print boots are also Saint Laurent. Both earrings are from FWRD.COM. The middle bag is Moschino and the bottom last bag is Fendi with a cool ’90s and ’80s retro feel to it, which I love. Lipgloss is from D’Lashes Shop. Both solid gold earrings are Versace. And last but not least the sneakers are Chloe.

P.S. Book those lash extensions appointments! I have a new lash expert technician joining the D’Lashes family for all your lash needs. More on that on the next post so stay tuned! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Fall lipgloss is D’Lashes. Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
